xml.logFileError: log File cannot be properly named, 'logPath' must finish by '\' in config.ini
xml.pathError: The following path does not exists : {0}
xml.type: Type of document to rename : 1 - File 2 - Folder
xml.mode: 1 - Step by step (simple) 2 - One line command (!Warning)
xml.reminder:
Reminder : 1- Adding characters Parameter: One or more characters Option 1 : At the beginning of the chain Option 2 : At the end of the chain
2- Deletion of characters Parameter: One or more characters
3- Deletion of numbers
4- Characters replacement Parameter: old char(s) and new char(s)
5- Full renaming Parameter: New name Option 1 : Differentiate names by number at the beginning of the chain Option 2 : Differentiate names by number at the end of the chain
6- Upper/lower case Option 1 : All upper case Option 2 : All lower case Option 3 : First letter upper case
7- Extension replacement /!\ Obviously not available for folders /!\ Parameter : new extension
Ex : 3|1:exa:2|4:-;__ Delete numbers then, add 'exa' at the end of the chain then, replace '-' by '__' Syntax : ':' between parameters and '|' between each command !!! Warning : Be sure about your command line, the process will continue until the end without asking validation at each step !!!
xml.validation: Last validation, are you sure to continue ? (Y/N)
xml.modifications: Modifications : 1 - Adding characters 2 - Deletion of characters 3 - Deletion of numbers 4 - Characters replacement 5 - Full renaming 6 - Upper/Lower case 7 - Extension replacement
xml.addBegin: Add {0} at the beginning of the chain
xml.addEnd: Add {0} at the end of the chain
xml.case1.2: 1 - At the beginning of the chain 2 - At the end of the chain
xml.case5.2: Différentiates names by : 1 - Number at the beginning of the chain 2 - Number at the end of the chain
xml.case6.1: 1 - All upper case 2 - All lower case 3 - First letter upper case
xml.case7.1: No extension change on a folder
xml.existingFileError: Impossible to create an existing file : {0} to {1}
xml.endWarn: End of program, see warnings in the console
xml.endErr: End of program, see errors log in the folder : {0}
xml.exitRestart: Press enter to exit, or '1' to restart
